summary: A nine-year-old girl who has just moved with her parents to Hamburg, Germany, is desperate for finding a best friend.
cast: Meira Durand|Felina Czycykowski|Julia Jentsch|Nora Tschirner|Fernando Spengler|Axel Prahl|Margarita Broich|Sandra Borgmann|Karoline Chmelensky|Valeria Eisenbart|Sidney Martins|Badasar Colbiyik|Tarja Loos|Tove Loos|Aliena Jacobs|Precious Wiesner|Cosmo Budde|Levin Henning|Tilo Nest|Axel Olsson|Arnd Klawitter|Ingrit Dohse|Jörn Knebel|Robin Gooch|Zoe Zwede|Marvin Heiden|Fynn Thilker|Milan Böttner|Jerry Wang|Tyron Ansuhenne|Eren Oguz|Jan Niklas Köhler|Ricardo Osango|Kian Hinsenkamp|Lennard Bensch|Jeremy Musik|Jiena Viduka|Alexander Scheling|Marcel Schiessendoppler|Sarah Diener|Tim Reingruber|Birthe Gerken|Kailas Mahadevan|Oti Nsafoah|Pablo Erpenbeck|Elias Bouamrane|Yannik Müller|Julian Graupner|Anne Bergstedt|Eveline Hall|Jacqueline Steeneck
title: Hier kommt Lola
